SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.server

Interface ServerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIServerImplementation, TCPClient
public interface ServerInterface extends Remote
Interface used to handle the communication between the server and the clients.

  • Method Details

    • getGames

      void getGames() throws RemoteException
      Asks the server to send the list of active games, together with some basic information about them.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while asking for the games.

    • createGame

      void createGame(String username, int numPlayers) throws RemoteException
      Creates a new game with the given number of players.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player that created the game.
      numPlayers - The number of players that will play the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while creating the game.

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(String gameId, String username) throws RemoteException
      Joins the game with the given ID.
      Parameters:
      gameId - The ID of the game to join.
      username - The username of the player that wants to join the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while joining the game.

    • setStarterCard

      void setStarterCard(SideType side) throws RemoteException
      Sets the starter card for the game.
      Parameters:
      side - The side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while setting the starter card.

    • setColor

      void setColor(PlayerColor color) throws RemoteException
      Sets the player's color.
      Parameters:
      color - The color of the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while setting the player's color.

    • setPersonalObjective

      void setPersonalObjective(ObjectiveCard objectiveCard) throws RemoteException
      Sets the player's personal objective.
      Parameters:
      objectiveCard - The player's personal objective.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while setting the player's personal objective.

    • playCard

      void playCard(PlayableCard playedCard, SideType side, Position pos) throws RemoteException
      Plays a card on the given side and position.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The card to play.
      side - The side on which the card will be played.
      pos - The position where the card will be played.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while setting the player's private objective.

    • drawCard

      void drawCard(DrawType drawType) throws RemoteException
      Draws a card from the deck or from the common cards.
      Parameters:
      drawType - The type of draw to perform (deck or common).
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while drawing the card.

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String text) throws RemoteException
      Sends a chat message to all the players in the game.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while sending the message.

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(String text, String receiverUsername) throws RemoteException
      Sends a chat message to the given player.
      Parameters:
      text - The text of the message.
      receiverUsername - The username of the player that will receive the message.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while sending the message.

    • disconnect

      void disconnect() throws RemoteException
      Disconnects the player from the game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while disconnecting the player.

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame() throws RemoteException
      Utility method that calls leaveGame(boolean) with a default forced=false.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while leaving the game.

    • leaveGame

      void leaveGame(boolean forced) throws RemoteException
      Lets the player leave the game, disconnecting them.
      Parameters:
      forced - false if the client decided spontaneously to leave; true if the client is leaving because the server told it to do so.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while leaving the game.

    • pong

      void pong() throws RemoteException
      Pongs the server to confirm that the client is still active.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an error occurs while sending the pong response to the server.
